name: superpower
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage each.
short_effect: Lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user attacks the foe with great power. However, it also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense.
flavor_text.platinum: The user attacks the foe with great power. However, it also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user attacks the foe with great power. However, it also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense.
